comment._content: Thanks for sharing these beautiful images! I used this image to illustrate a statemet about the Paris Exposition from German Politician and co-founder of the „Deutsche Werkbund“ Friedrich Naumann (1860-1919). It's my personal blog dealing with historical stuff, images, illustrations, quotes … vorvorvorgestern.de/friedrich-naumann-ausstellungsbericht...
